content:
DbGeometry Class

Definition

Provides a base class for objects that define geometric shapes.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.BindableType]
[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract]
public class DbGeometry
Inheritance
System.Object
DbGeometry

Equals(Object,Object)

Properties

Area

Gets a nullable double value that indicates the area of this DbGeometry value, which may be null if this value does not represent a surface.

public Nullable<double> Area { get; }
Value
Nullable<Double>

A nullable double value that indicates the area of this DbGeometry value.

Gets the boundary of the DbGeometry objects.

public System.Data.Spatial.DbGeometry Boundary { get; }
Value
DbGeometry

The boundary of the DbGeometry objects.

Gets the DbGeometry value that represents the centroid of this DbGeometry value, which may be null if this value does not represent a surface.

public System.Data.Spatial.DbGeometry Centroid { get; }
Value
DbGeometry

The DbGeometry value that represents the centroid of this DbGeometry value.

Value

Gets the dimension of the given DbGeometry value or, if the value is a collection, the dimension of its largest element.

public int Dimension { get; }
Value
Int32

The dimension of the given DbGeometry value.

ElementCount

Gets the number of elements in this DbGeometry value, if it represents a geometry collection. The number of elements in this geometry value, if it represents a collection of other geometry values; otherwise null.

public Nullable<int> ElementCount { get; }
Value
Nullable<Int32>

The number of elements in this DbGeometry value.

Elevation

Gets the elevation (Z coordinate) of this DbGeometry value, if it represents a point. The elevation (Z coordinate) of this geometry value, if it represents a point; otherwise null.

public Nullable<double> Elevation { get; }
Value
Nullable<Double>

The elevation (Z coordinate) of this DbGeometry value.

Value

The envelope (minimum bounding box) of this DbGeometry value.

public System.Data.Spatial.DbGeometry ExteriorRing { get; }

DbGeometry

The DbGeometry value that represents the exterior ring of this DbGeometry value.

Value
Nullable<Int32>

The number of interior rings in this DbGeometry value.

Determines whether this DbGeometry value spatially relates to the specified DbGeometry argument according to the given Dimensionally Extended Nine-Intersection Model (DE-9IM) intersection pattern.
